abstract: Revenue in the second quarter fell, but the company added more contract subscribers and its operating profit was better than expected.
snippet: Revenue in the second quarter fell, but the company added more contract subscribers and its operating profit was better than expected.
lead_paragraph: Despite the iPhone’s strong gravitational pull, Verizon is managing to attract more new customers than AT&T, the phone’s exclusive American carrier. Verizon also beat analysts’ profit estimates for the second quarter, excluding one-time charges.

headline.main: Verizon Posts a Loss After Paying for Buyouts
headline.print_headline: Verizon Retains Its Lead in Wireless in Latest Quarter
